entry.title: BLOODLINE PROTOCOL
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 161,493Chapters: 47/?Kudos: 184

Summary: At Beacon Hills Preparatory, tradition is everything. For over a century, the elite boarding school has divided its student body into five historic houses where each one seemingly determined by a mix of academic performance, behavior, and an unspoken layer of socioeconomic legacy. Most students follow in the footsteps of their families; generation after generation they're sorted into the same houses. No one questions the system. It’s simply the way things are. Until now. Midway through his freshman year, a “routine” blood test for school health records takes an unexpected turn. One sharp-witted yet grounded Stiles, recently appointed as House Prefect of the mid-tier House Flagstaff largely due to his father’s position as the town sheriff, is abruptly reassigned to House Redwood, the school’s most elite and secretive house. He must now navigate secret traditions, political manipulation, and a slow-burning forbidden romance with someone he was never meant to meet: the enigmatic sophomore son of a ruthless defense attorney.

entry.title: Loving Isaac
entry.summary:
Author: QueenOfAngst21

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,190Chapters: 20/20Kudos: 2,967

Summary: A regular patrol around their land takes a turn for the worse when Derek and Isaac run into a unwanted visitor. Just when Derek thinks they are in the clear, he wakes to find not his beta beside him but a crying blonde haired baby right where he left Isaac. The pack stumbles over themselves as their alpha and emissary navigate this new dynamic and find each other along the way.***AKA Isaac is de-aged, Derek and Stiles try to reverse the change but they find something better along the way***Set after Season 2, not in canon with the showTranslations must have permission first

entry.title: Same But Different
entry.summary:
Author: Reiko009

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,393Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: “Let me help, love.” Peter pulled away, which made Derek almost whimper at the loss of contact. The new pet name was only used when they were alone like this. Somehow the word was both too weak to describe what their coupling actually meant and a far more intimate endearment than what Derek felt that he deserved. What they were doing wasn’t love so much as need – just with some added feelings bleeding through. Even now, he could sense his wolf curling protectively around what belonged to him, what anchored him, and what strengthened him as the Alpha. True, his pack was small: just him and Peter. But that was enough – for now. A spicey reimagining of Season 2 where sex is the answer to Peter finding forgiveness and to keeping Derek sane as a new Alpha. Old foes and a new threat emerge, all while the Hale wolves both begin to fall for a very human high schooler with deep brown eyes and a loud mouth. Expect a lot of familiar plot points from the canon, just with a twist. Basically an excuse to write uncle/nephew werewolf porn - so you have been warned.

entry.title: Of A Butterfly's Wings
entry.summary:
Author: Mikaelsonbich25

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 129,208Chapters: 80/?Kudos: 236

Summary: Klaus had expected to be done with life after sacrificing himself. He was sure that he could finally rest and be done with it. But, much to his dismay, an otherworldly being had other plans, due to finding Klaus as a source of entertainment.In snatching away his desired death, Klaus Mikaelson was reincarnated into another world as a young magic caster named Stiles Stilinski. With no choice but to live, Klaus decides to use this opportunity to take over Beacon Hills and make it his kingdom.And maybe one day, he'll be strong enough to find a way back home to his world.

entry.title: Latibule
entry.summary:
Author: Deanslefttoe

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,044Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 74

Summary: Latibule: (noun.) A hiding place; a place or person of safety and comfort Stiles is at college, in his second year of study, trying to navigate being a broke student, being away from his home town, and being kicked out of his pack.Stiles is prepared, feeling less off balance than his previous year at college, he's excited, even, ready to get through as much as possible. And, he is almost over the guilt and shame and heartbreak that came with the whole getting kicked out of his pack thing. Yes, he still has a crush on Derek, but he has had a crush on Derek since he was 16, and now at 21, he's pretty sure he can manage.What happens when Stiles's new Folklore & Anthropology professor turns out to be Derek Hale, the one who kicked him from the pack 2 years earlier? What happens when Stiles is so utterly convinced that Derek hates him that he can't read between the lines of what the werewolf is trying to tell him?Read to find out ;)

Author: QueenOfAngst21

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 173,463Chapters: 43/44Kudos: 2,449

Summary: ** Under Major Re-Work, come back Feb 14th for new and approved Emerald Eyed Mystery* It's been two months but the Void won't go away. With his brother turning against him and with no where else to turn, Stiles looks to the place he least expected. If Beacon Hills is destroying him then when better to run away then at 1am on a Thursday. Three years later, with the fate of Supernatural world on their shoulders they must return but Stiles isn't defenceless anymore. He's an Alpha Mate and his eyes aren't normal; they are emerald.  *Mature Warnings Given When Needed*

entry.title: Dying In Love
entry.summary:
Author: amatorial

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,756Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 59

Summary: After dropping out of his FBI internship, Stiles returned to Beacon Hills, struggling to outgrow the version of himself high school forced him to become. He wasn't sure what he was doing with his life, but he kept busy among the shelves at The Reading Nook, letting the quiet and routine distract him from the memories. And then Derek Hale walked in. Derek being in his life again stirred a hunger inside Stiles, a wanting that consumed him whole. It left him breathless, filled with a love so fierce it clawed at his chest and threatened to tear him apart inside.

entry.title: My Name is Derek Hale [comic]
entry.summary:
Author: Melioristicbeast

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 0Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 981

Summary: From the original fic this comic is an adaptation of:“What day is it?” Derek demanded. “What?” “The day! What day is today?!” Derek let Stiles go, but only so he could reach into his pocket and pull out his phone. He tapped at the home screen, and then went so perfectly still that Stiles was pretty sure this guy wasn’t human. No human could stand that still. When it was clear Derek wasn’t going to move again without some prompting, Stiles said, “It’s Wednesday.” “That’s impossible,” Derek whispered. “Not really, it comes around every seven days.” “This is impossible,” Derek said again, looking around himself, as if he was searching for something.

entry.title: Where Ashes Lie
entry.summary:
Author: TendreChaos

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 109,807Chapters: 19/40Kudos: 114

Summary: Stiles has always known he was different, that there was something inside him people were afraid of.In a society where the supernatural is hunted and contained, sorcerers are stripped of their names, their freedom, and their humanity. After months of captivity behind concrete walls, Stiles manages to escape and disappears into the woods, where he finds a rebel group willing to take him in. But trust is fragile and Stiles carries a secret, a power he barely understands and cannot share.Because if they knew the truth, if they knew what Stiles really was... They wouldn’t hate the cage that once held him.They’d build a stronger one.
